articles.title: Shohei Ohtani signing with Dodgers on record $700 million contract
articles.description: The deal was announced after days of speculation where the unique, two-way star would continue his career after six seasons with the Los Angeles Angels.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) — Shohei Ohtani has set a financial record to go along with his singular on-field performance, getting $700 million to make a 30-mile move up Interstate 5 to the Los Angeles Dodgers.
His agent, Nez Balelo, issued a midafternoon news rel... [5955 chars]

articles.title: Nashville tornado: Severe storms tear through central Tennessee
articles.description: Severe storms killed six people and sent about two dozen to the hospital as homes and businesses were severely damaged in multiple cities through central Tennessee.
articles.content:
NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — Severe storms that tore through central Tennessee killed six people Saturday and sent about two dozen to the hospital as homes and businesses were damaged in multiple cities.
Three people, including a child, were killed after ... [4914 chars]

articles.title: UPenn president Liz Magill and Board Chair Scott Bok resign after disastrous hearing on antisemitism
articles.description: In a stunning downfall for the leader of one of the world’s most prestigious universities, Liz Magill, the president of University of Pennsylvania, voluntarily stepped down from the helm of the Ivy League school on Saturday following a torrent of criticism for her testimony about antisemitism on Capitol Hill Tuesday. Board Chair Scott Bok also resigned Saturday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Heisman Trophy 2023: Jayden Daniels, quarterback for Louisiana State University, named winner
articles.description: It is the pinnacle of individual achievements for a college football player and a lot of the greats over the years have won it.
articles.content:
CNN —
Jayden Daniels, the quarterback for Louisiana State University, was named the winner of the 2023 Heisman Trophy Saturday evening.
One of four finalists, Daniels edged out fellow quarterbacks Bo Nix of Oregon and Washington’s Michael Penix Jr., ... [6778 chars]

articles.title: Shohei Ohtani: Two-time AL MVP agrees to deal with the Los Angeles Dodgers
articles.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers have won the race to reach terms with two-time MVP Shohei Ohtani on a 10-year deal worth $700 million, according to ESPN, MLB.com and other media outlets citing Ohtani’s agent, Nez Balelo.
articles.content:
CNN —
The Los Angeles Dodgers have won the race to reach terms with Shohei Ohtani, baseball’s transcendent two-way star, to one of the richest contracts in professional sports.

articles.title: Harris County voters watching closely as early runoff votes trickle in

articles.content:
